text.p: You know the turn undead spell. It doesn't count toward your number of known spells.
Choose a god to serve who matches your alignment (see Deities). You have a holy symbol for your god (it takes up no gear slots).

You can cast priest spells you know. You know two tier 1 spells of your choice from the priest spell list. Each time you gain a level, you choose new priest spells to learn according to the Priest Spells Known table. For casting priest spells, see Spellcasting.
